fields.name: headline

fields.name: subheadline
fields.label: Subheadline
fields.description: Subheadline text (e.g., 'WELLNESS MARKET VALUE*')

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Main description text

fields.name: bullet-points
fields.label: Bullet Points
fields.description: List of bullet points to display

fields.name: footnote
fields.label: Footnote
fields.description: Footnote text (e.g., '5%: average growth rate of other industries*')

fields.name: title
fields.label: Chart Title
fields.description: Optional title displayed above the chart

fields.name: subtitle
fields.label: Chart Subtitle
fields.description: Optional subtitle displayed below the chart

fields.name: data
fields.label: Chart Data (JSON)
fields.description: Chart data in JSON format. Example: [{"category": "Item 1", "value": 50}, {"category": "Item 2", "value": 30}]

fields.name: width
fields.label: Width
fields.description: Chart width (e.g., 100%, 800px). Leave empty for auto width.

fields.name: height
fields.label: Height
fields.description: Chart height (e.g., 400px, 50vh)

fields.name: colors
fields.label: Custom Colors
fields.description: Comma-separated hex colors (e.g., #123257, #e8f557, #66bfc7). Leave empty for default colors.

fields.name: show-legend
fields.label: Show Legend
fields.description: Display legend for pie and donut charts

fields.name: show-labels
fields.label: Show Labels
fields.description: Display data labels on chart elements

fields.name: animation
fields.label: Enable Animation
fields.description: Animate chart on load

fields.name: tableIntro
fields.label: Table Intro
fields.description: Rich text content to display before the table
fields.value: You can add any rich text content here.

fields.name: tableContent
fields.label: Table Content
fields.description:
Markdown table format. Example:
| CATEGORY | BMI FROM | BMI TO |
|----------|----------|--------|
| Normal   | 18.5     | 25     |
| Overweight | 25     | 30     |
fields.value:
| Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 |
|----------|----------|----------|
| Cell 1   | Cell 2   | Cell 3   |
| Cell 4   | Cell 5   | Cell 6   |
